resource.description: A module that has been registered in the CloudFormation registry.

properties.name: ModuleName
properties.description:
The name of the module being registered.

Recommended module naming pattern: company_or_organization::service::type::MODULE.

type.description:
The name of the module being registered.

Recommended module naming pattern: company_or_organization::service::type::MODULE.

properties.name: ModulePackage
properties.description: The url to the S3 bucket containing the schema and template fragment for the module you want to register.

type.description: The url to the S3 bucket containing the schema and template fragment for the module you want to register.

attributes.description: A module that has been registered in the CloudFormation registry.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the module.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the module.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the registered module.

type.description: The description of the registered module.

properties.name: DocumentationUrl
properties.description: The URL of a page providing detailed documentation for this module.

type.description: The URL of a page providing detailed documentation for this module.

properties.name: IsDefaultVersion
properties.description: Indicator of whether this module version is the current default version

type.description: Indicator of whether this module version is the current default version

properties.name: Schema
properties.description: The schema defining input parameters to and resources generated by the module.

type.description: The schema defining input parameters to and resources generated by the module.

properties.name: TimeCreated
properties.description: The time that the specified module version was registered.

type.description: The time that the specified module version was registered.

properties.name: VersionId
properties.description: The version ID of the module represented by this module instance.

type.description: The version ID of the module represented by this module instance.

properties.name: Visibility
properties.description:
The scope at which the type is visible and usable in CloudFormation operations.

The only allowed value at present is:

PRIVATE: The type is only visible and usable within the account in which it is registered. Currently, AWS CloudFormation marks any types you register as PRIVATE.

type.description:
The scope at which the type is visible and usable in CloudFormation operations.

The only allowed value at present is:

PRIVATE: The type is only visible and usable within the account in which it is registered. Currently, AWS CloudFormation marks any types you register as PRIVATE.
